column2:
"This is Deegnacht...
Wow, it really is completely different from Deeg."

"What? Oh, sure. I can tell just by looking.
Of course, this is the first time I've ever
actually seen one with my own eyeballs."

"Anyway, here's your reward. Now, to carve it
up while it's still fresh. Looks like Deegnacht
carpaccio will be on today's menu!"
